item.description:
Join us for Lunch at Not your Average Joe's in Randolph.
We need to have at least 6 Yeses for this one to go.


Not Your Average Joe's
16 Mazzeo Drive
Randolph, MA 02368
781-961-7200


Event Organizers: Janet and Kathy

Min/Max: A Maximum of 15 can attend (16 can RSVP Yes since the GRoup Organizer is always a Yes regardless of whether or not she can attend)

Guests: Up to 2 Guests per Group Member are Welcome

RSVP Deadline: 4pm on Friday, October 26th


Directions: Will be posted by Thursday, October 25th.
Overview: Located in a strip mall on Route 139, approx. 1/4 mile East of Showcase Cinemas and 1/2 mile off of Route 24 (Exit 19/Randolph/139E)

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch at Not Your Average Joe's
